alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued September 05 at 3:32PM AKDT until September 08 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKDT THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until midnight AKDT Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Items left on the beach will wash away. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds gusting to 40 mph will develop tonight and continue into Thursday night. These winds will cause high surf to develop tonight. The highest surf will be along northwest facing shores such as in the Bering Strait and the North side of St Lawrence Island.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
